title: God Reassures Moses
summary: Exodus 6 begins with God reaffirming His promise to deliver Israel with mighty acts. He reveals more of His covenant with Abraham and instructs Moses to speak to Pharaoh again. A genealogy of Levi is also included.

faq.question: What did God promise in this chapter?
faq.answer: That He would deliver the Israelites with an outstretched arm and bring them to the Promised Land.

faq.question: Why is the genealogy included?
faq.answer: To show the lineage of Moses and Aaron and establish their priestly authority.
